body_html: As a friendly suggestion, if your implementation is faster than SLEEF I also suggest reaching out to them. That could actually have even more impact that just adding this to pytorch. In the meantime I'll pull in SLEEF for tanh. That'll give us an easy speedup until this more optimal version is merged (or added to SLEEF itself).
body_text: As a friendly suggestion, if your implementation is faster than SLEEF I also suggest reaching out to them. That could actually have even more impact that just adding this to pytorch. In the meantime I'll pull in SLEEF for tanh. That'll give us an easy speedup until this more optimal version is merged (or added to SLEEF itself).
body: As a friendly suggestion, if your implementation is faster than SLEEF I also suggest reaching out [to them](https://github.com/shibatch/sleef). That could actually have even more impact that just adding this to pytorch. In the meantime [I'll pull in SLEEF for tanh](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/7513). That'll give us an easy speedup until this more optimal version is merged (or added to SLEEF itself).
